summary: Motoko and Batou work to try to stop a terrorist organization whose symbol is the Scylla. Meanwhile, Togusa investigates a murder of a man who possessed a prosthetic leg manufactured by the Mermaid's Leg corporation.
cast: Maaya Sakamoto|Ikkyu Juku|Ken'ichirô Matsuda|Tarusuke Shingaki|Shunsuke Sakuya|Takurou Nakakuni|Yôji Ueda|Kazuya Nakai|Miyuki Sawashiro|Tatsuhisa Suzuki|Aya Hisakawa|Chad Horii|Mayumi Asano|Ai Kayano|Yuka Keicho|Takahiro Fujiwara|Shin'ya Hamazoe|Rieko Kamenaka|Hironori Kondo|Takehiro Hasu|Masayoshi Sugawara|Bryn Apprill|Major Attaway|Anthony Bowling|Colleen Clinkenbeard|Cynthia Cranz|Wyn Delano|Jason Douglas|Chuck Huber|Bill Jenkins|Jason Liebrecht|Brian Mathis|Elizabeth Maxwell|Mary Elizabeth McGlynn|Anastasia Munoz|Alex Organ|Phil Parsons|Brandon Potter|Chris Rager|Christopher Sabat|Jad Saxton|Marcus D. Stimac|Mark Stoddard|John Swasey|Eric Vale|David Wald
title: Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 3 - Ghost Tears
